#This is a page for recording the various options for GeoXml
= Introduction =
 GeoXml has many options though a large number correspond to those in EGeoXml, we can record divergence here.
----
{{{
 alwaysinfopop: true 
}}}
the above results in informational bubbles opening even when a element is clicked programmatically or from a sidebar click.

---- 

----
{{{
 zoomhere: 12 
}}}
the above results in informational bubbles with directions using a Zoom level of 12 when you click on Zoom Here
